segments.text: Oh , Jane . What on earth have you been ? I've called you a thousand times .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , John . I suddenly got a severe stomachache last night , and stayed in hospital the whole day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I called your cell phone , and there was no answer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , I left it at home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's OK now . Don't worry , John .
segments.speaker: S1
